description: An odd necklace with rescaled beautiful bloodrune stone to fit and attach to the center. The thinned layer caused the core to pulsate faster.
An odd necklace with a beautifully etched bloodrune stone in eagle's talon shape. If you prick your fingertip in its sharp point, you feel your blood rushing towards it.
A shimmering bloodrune ring with a tiny etched symbol under it. A proof of loyalty to the commando.
